page.title: 06EDUCATION
page.content:
There is one primary school which adjoins Chorlton Park.There are four secondary schools,three of which have extensive playing fields and the fourth has a large paved yard.All are under the Manchester Education Committee;the newest is about 15 years old and the only Roman Catholic one is surrounded by a new housing estate.
In other parts of the block can be found various independent schools, including Chorlton Convent HS (girls), William Hulme's Grammar School, (780 boys), St. Bede's School and Amberleigh Preparatory School.
